title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\AvailabilityFilter
name: AvailabilityFilter
description:
Filter on availability signals.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.AvailabilityFilter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.signal_type
params.description: Required. Type of signal to apply filter on.

params.name: data.range
params.description: Required. Range of times to filter candidate signals by.

params.name: data.required
params.description: If multiple [AvailabilityFilter][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.AvailabilityFilter] are provided, the default behavior is to OR all filters, but if this field is set to true, this particular [AvailabilityFilter][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.AvailabilityFilter] will be AND'ed against other [AvailabilityFilter][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.AvailabilityFilter].
